name: science-fair-registration
description: Science Fair Registration Application with React Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=4000 FRONTEND_ORIGIN=http://localhost:4173 npm start
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:4000 npm start
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop science-fair && docker rm science-fair
